靏字的基本解释

靏
义未详。

靏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hè］
［《廣韻》下各切，入鐸，匣。］
亦作“寉1”。“鹤1”的繁体字。亦作“靍1”。亦作“靎1”。亦作“靏1”。“鵠3”的被通假字。亦作“鶮1”。亦作“鸖1”。
(1)鸟纲鹤科各种类的统称。我国常见的有：丹顶鹤、白鹤、灰鹤、黑颈鹤、赤颈鹤、白头鹤、白枕鹤、蓑羽鹤等。古代诗词图画中常指丹顶鹤或白鹤。
(2)比喻白色。参见“鶴鶴”、“鶴髮”。
(3)指鹤版书。
(4)星名。见《明史·天文志一》。

靏字的康熙字典解释
靏字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
靏字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Liu
The meaning is unclear.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hè］
["Guang Yun" under each cut, enter the duo, box. ]
Also known as "寉1". Traditional characters of "鹤1". Also known as "靍1". Also known as "靎1". Also known as "靏1". "Hu 3" was passed falsely. Also known as "鶮1". Also known as "鸖1".
(1) A collective term for the various species of Aniidae. The common ones in our country are: red-crowned cranes, white cranes, grey cranes, black-necked cranes, red-necked cranes, hooded cranes, white-naped cranes, demoiselle cranes, etc. In ancient poetry and pictures, red-crowned cranes or white cranes are often referred to.
(2) The metaphor is white. See "Crane Crane", "Crane Hair".
(3) Refers to the crane version of the book.
(4) Star name. See "Ming History·Astronomy Chronicle One".
